text: Uya kuthi (uAllâh kubo): “Ngenani ke ebandleni lezizwe ezanandulelayo, (izizwe) zabantu neejinni, eMlilweni”. Ngalo lonke ixesha kungena isizwe esitsha, (singena) siqalekise isizwe esingumsakwaso esasingaphambili kunaso bade bonke baqundaniswe eMlilweni. Abokugqibela kubo baya kuthi ngabokuqala; “Nkosi yethu! Aba basilahlekisa, ke ngoko banike isohlwayo esiphindwe kabini soMlilo”. Athi Yena: “Ngamnye kuni apho unesohlwayo esiphindwe kabini koko anazi nina.”
